room_title: Escape room "Forgotten Pharaoh" by Escape This Madison in Madison
review: Our group of 8 international students had a blast in the "Forgotten Pharaoh" room! Very well organized, authentic and not to mention a great learning experience for our students! We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Forgotten Pharaoh" by Escape This Madison in Madison
review: Our group of 9 newbies all had an absolute blast running the Pharaoh escape. The puzzles were varied and just challenging enough that we were all able to jump into one and work together on the bigger picture - apparently in record time! We're already planning our next trip.

room_title: Escape room "Forgotten Pharaoh" by Escape This Madison in Madison
review: We had a great time! We escaped with six minutes to spare. I thought our room (Egyptian/Pharoh) was a ton of fun! Challenging and interesting puzzles and good atmosphere. My first time doing an escape room.
